original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edge up in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.20 percent or 22.92 points to 11,335.11, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.33 percent or 10.66 points to 3,288.19
Top gainers during 1200 hours were Expolanka, Hatton National Bank & Cargills. (Colombo/July31/2023)
